Summary: Moon looking disk seen over Vancouver (south) BC Canada with blood orange color
trends: There have been 33 other sightings in Vancouver
There were no other sightings in Vancouver on or around August 31st 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting details1:30 a.m: i was about to take my dog for a walk when i noticed what i thought was a very large moon with a deep orange\red color, and a very sharp edge. it was hanging just above the roof line of the homes on 16th street(south of where i was standing). it reminded me of a beautiful moon i had seen some years ago and i rushed to get to a clearing so i could get a better look at it.when i tried to spot it again after 5 minutes it was no longer there. there was scattered cloud so i figured it was behind the clouds and no longer visible. but, just to make sure i returned to the same exact spot after walking the dog. still no 'moon'. the next night i went out at exactly the same time just to make sure. the moon was out, but not perfectly full, nor in the spot i had seen the orange disk. i took a night picture from were i was standing the night before at 1:30 on the 1st of september. it shows the moon where it should have been on the 31st of august, and where i saw the disk. the disk was at an elevation of 60 degrees from where i was standing and the size of a quarter with my arm stretched out at my fingertips. i was facing south.
